description.text: I started at PRA during the MVP stage of prapay.com. It was an exciting time that allowed for many opportunities and fun challenges to help our customers and grow the business.
My main duties focused on front end design and development while learning ASP.Net MVC 5. My average tasks per sprint included full stack development utizilizing async requests to internal APIs.
Working closely with our product owner and stake holders, we designed and developed new features focusing on our user's experiences, satisfaction, abandonment, and conversions.

achievements.text: Lead corporate redesign of prapay.com.  Initial average increase of $3.5 million in monthly income via payments made through web application after redesign.
Lead redesign of payment process user experience for the United Kingdom prapay.com web application.  Initial monthly increase of $1 million in income through payments made.
Lead User eXperience and User Interface design initiatives for new features.
Designed and developed a virtual assistant using the W3C speech synthesis and speech recognition APIs.

contributions.text: Standardized developer guidelines for front end coding per best practices.
Balsamic wireframing during concept phases to capture interfaces and flows.
Bootstrap 4 / SASS / jQuery for rapid prototyping for clickables demos and final builds.
Implemented daily team code reviews for guidance and collaberation.
User experience audits and enhancements with LightHouse and Axe.
ADA accessability for WCAG 2.0 compliancy.
Conceived, researched, designed, and developed new features to improve our customers experience and increase conversions for the web application.

description.text: True Health Diagnostics purchased Health Diagnostic Laboratories and I was offered the position of Lead UX Developer.

My main duties focused on front end design and development.  I worked very closely with our executives, product owners, and stake holders to help design and develop both new applications and enhancements to our current ones.
I had the pleaseure of working with many extremely knowledgeable and creative people during my time with True Health and HDL growing both professionaly and personaly with them.

achievements.text: Lead front end application development utilizing Bootstrap 3, Google Material Design Lite, AngularJS, LESS, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, JSON, and Thymeleaf for applications built with Java.
Lead integration of responsive designs with single page and MVC applications.
Lead push for content delivery network to serve brand files for CSS and JavaScript for all internal applications.
Lead direction for Restful API services to deliver content to front end.
Lead wire framing mock ups for new applications.
Lead front end initiative to modularize JavaScript files, implement separation of concerns and D.R.Y methodologies.

contributions.text: Standardized developer guidelines for front end coding per best practices.
Balsamic wireframing during concept phases to capture interfaces and flows.
Bootstrap 4 / SASS / jQuery for rapid prototyping for clickables demos and final builds.
Implemented daily team code reviews for guidance and collaberation.
User experience audits and enhancements with LightHouse and Axe.
ADA accessability for WCAG 2.0 compliancy.
Conceived, researched, designed, and developed new features to improve our customers experience and increase conversions for the web application.

description.text: I came onboard at the time when we were still in the MVP stage for our web application. This was very exciting and allowed for many opportunities for improvement to help our customers.

I was able to utilized my front end strengths while growing my back end skill sets with ASP.Net. My typical tasks for every sprint consisted of full stack development up to our APIs and back to the views.
Working closely with our Product Owner and Stakeholders, I designed and developed user work flows focusing on our user's experience, satisfaction, and conversions to payments.

achievements.text: Member of the Global Asset Management team, representing the face of high quality design and development practices.
Partnered with the Software Center of Excellence architecture and engineering teams to implement UI solutions that are aligned and extend shared platforms and solutions.
Extensive JavaScript, JQUERY, and Angular JS development.

achievements.text: Worked closely with Senior Leadership, Management, Designers, and Developers to lead the UI/UX development of a custom 960 responsive grid system to meet their requirements for web, mobile, ASP.net and J2EE integration for their multiple ecommerce based websites including walmart.stationery.com, iprint.com, and officedepot.com.
Supporting the developers' efforts to integrate resulting product with back end development.
